謲字的基本解释

謲
càn
相怒。

謲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
［《廣韻》蘇到切，去号，心。］
亦作“謲1”。
(1)欢呼。
(2)叫嚷；喧闹。
(3)众口盛传。
(4)通“躁”。急躁，浮躁。参见“譟險”。
(5)通“劋”。狡猾。参见“譟詐”。

謲字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謲； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1178第07
【唐韻】倉南切【集韻】倉含切，?音參。【說文】相怒使也。　又人名。孟謲，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【集韻】【類篇】?蘇含切，音毿。謲譚，怒語也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?七紺切，參上聲。義同。一曰伺也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?楚錦切，郴上聲。隂言譏之也。

謲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
謲字的起名意思

暂无。

謲
Basic explanation of words
謲
càn
Angry.
謲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
["Guangyun" Su Daqie, Quhao, Xin. ]
Also known as "謲1".
(1) Cheers.
(2) Shouting; noisy.
(3) It is widely spread.
(4) Through "impatient". Impatient, impetuous. See "Noise Risk".
(5) Pass "劋". cunning. See "Fraud".
謲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謲; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1178 Page 07
[Tang Yun] Cang Nanqie [Ji Yun] Cang Hanqie,? Sounds. [Said the text] The messenger is also angry.　Another name. Meng Ke, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Su Hanqie, Yinmo. Fu Tan, anger also.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Seven cuts, join the sound. The same meaning. One said to serve.　[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Chu Jinqie, Chen Shangsheng. Negative words are also ridiculing.
謲
